notes: Grok 4 was released on July 9, 2025, alongside the Grok 4 Heavy variant. Results cover both variants across several benchmarks, including configurations with and without native tool use (Python code interpreter and web search) where specified. Agentic Vending-Bench scores represent averages across five independent runs.
